post.description: Authenticate user and return a JWT token.
Register a new user with username, password, role, and optional outlet ID.

put.description: Block a user by their Uuid. Only admin can perform this action.
Unblock a user by their Uuid. Only admin can perform this action.

post.description: Create a new order with specified products and quantities.

get.description: Get a single order by its Uuid.
Get a list of all outlets.

post.description: Create a new outlet with the provided details.

get.description: Get a list of all orders for a given outlet.
get.summary: Get all orders for an outlet

get.description: Get a list of products available in a specific outlet.
Get a list of all purchase orders for a given outlet.
get.summary: Get all purchase orders for an outlet

get.description: Get a list of all stock quantities for products in a given outlet.
get.summary: Get all stocks for an outlet

get.description: Get the stock quantity for a specific product in a given outlet.
get.summary: Get stock for a product in an outlet

put.description: Update the stock quantity for a specific product in an outlet. This is for direct stock adjustments.

get.description: Get a single outlet by its Uuid.

put.description: Update an existing outlet by its Uuid.

delete.description: Delete an outlet by its Uuid.

get.description: Get a list of all products.

post.description: Create a new product with the provided details.

get.description: Get a single product by its External ID.
Get a list of recipes for a given main product.

put.description: Update an existing product by its External ID.

delete.description: Delete a product by its Uuid.

post.description: Create a new purchase order with specified supplier, outlet, and products.

get.description: Get a single purchase order by its Uuid.

put.description: Mark a purchase order as completed and update stock quantities.

post.description: Create a new recipe with the provided details.

get.description: Get a single recipe by its Uuid.

put.description: Update an existing recipe by its Uuid.

delete.description: Delete a recipe by its Uuid.

get.description: Get a sales report for a specific outlet within a date range.
Get a sales report for a specific product within a date range.

put.description: Update the stock quantity for a specific product in an outlet by providing IDs in the request body.

get.description: Get a list of all suppliers.

post.description: Create a new supplier with the provided details.

get.description: Get a single supplier by its Uuid.

put.description: Update an existing supplier by its Uuid.

delete.description: Delete a supplier by its Uuid.
